Flagship Venture

Petiole: AI-Powered Plant Phenotyping

As CEO and Co-Founder, I lead the development of computer vision solutions that provide real-time insights into plant health. Petiole turns any smartphone into a powerful leaf area meter, bridging the gap between high-tech research and accessible field data.
